page.title: 13A DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: I get up at 7.30 and have a wash and get dressed. I usually have toast and a cup of tea then I watch TVAM. My best friend comes for me at 8.20 and we walk to school.{(Education)} We get there about 8.40. The bell goes at 8.50. When the bell goes I say goodbye to Susan and go inside. Our first lesson is French and our second lesson is Welsh. Then we have break and I usually get a packet of crisps. Then I go to P.E., we usually do the long jump. After we go to maths and then it is dinner time. After dinner it is history then design. We have different design subjects such as woodwork, pottery, art, needlework and cookery. I am doing needlework at the moment. After needlework it is hometime.
